alert.note: Alert for Great Salt Lake Desert and Mountains (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 03 at 2:31PM MDT by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Box Elder and northwestern Tooele Counties through 315 PM MDT... At 231 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 12 miles south of Wendover, moving north at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Wendover and Bonneville Salt Flats. This includes Interstate 80 in Utah between mile markers 0 and 16. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. A severe thunderstorm watch remains in effect until 900 PM MDT for northern Utah.

area.areaDesc: Great Salt Lake Desert and Mountains
